title: Bloomberg Markets: Hedge Funds Gain in Market Rally
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Hedge Funds Gain in Market Rally
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Hema Parmar Hedge Fund Reporter Bloomberg Brief Discussing rallying stock markets are helping lift returns at mega-hedge funds including Viking Global Investors and Renaissance Technologies.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
